Title: Sales Manager - Dakar
Description: We are currently seeking a dynamic person with experience in the hotel industry to join our team in Senegal. Sales experience is preferable but not a must if you are willing to learn and you have contacts in the hotel industry within the country. You will be joining our growing global sales team presenting the HRS wide portfolio of products to hospitality related companies across Senegal.

Title: Développeur Python H/F - Ouest Foire
Description: Rejoignez AMENTYS en tant que  Développeur Python  pour un stage à partir de Juillet 2024 !  Concrètement votre quotidien ?  Au sein de l'équipe IT vous intègrerez la nouvelle cellule de développement et innovation. Cette cellule vise à doter la direction d'une capacité de proposition de solutions innovantes pour fournir des solutions pragmatiques aux besoins métiers. La cellule sera composée principalement de développeurs Java, Python pour les backend et des fonctionnels ayant une forte expertise métier. Au sein de cette cellule, vous contribuerez à développer des programmes / modules à valeur ajoutée pour nos clients.

Title: Chef de Département : Coopération Multilatérale pour l’Afrique
Description: ATAF     is seeking       a strategy professional capable of leading and implementing the necessary strategies        as       Head of     Department      :       Multilateral Trade             As a member of the      ATAF     Senior Management Team   , you will manage the implementation of     ATAF     's multilateral exchange agenda and program at continental and international levels, in order to support member countries and to positively influence the thinking and formulation of policies aligned with the African agenda.

Title: Chef de Département : Services aux Membres
Description: ATAF     is seeking a       dynamic       individual       for the role of     Department      Head : Member Services to     lead and implement     the     organization's      programs and strategies.           As a member of      the senior management team, your role will be to manage the operations and service delivery of the   member     services department .
